Class HealthCircle

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      HealthCircle

public class HealthCircle
extends greenfoot.Actor

Circle that represents current health, the inner circle changes color with health, a box that gives a summary of the status with colors, and a mana bar.

Constructor Detail

HealthCircle

public HealthCircle()
Constructing a new health bar. No parameters, automatically defaults maximum HP and manna to 100.

HealthCircle

public HealthCircle(double imHP)
Constructing a new health bar. Initializes maximum manna to 100

Parameters:
imHP - Put in the maximum amount of HP you want the object to have.

Constructing a new health bar.

Parameters:

imManna - Put in the maximum amount of manna you want the object to have
Method Detail

update

public void update(boolean damage,
                   boolean manChange)
Updating the health bars. Must be called every time you want to change the amount of HP.

Parameters:
damage - If true, it reduces the amount of HP and manna; if false, it increases the amount of HP and manna. Increments by 1.

update

public void update(double damage,
                   double manChange)
Updates the health bars. Must be called everytime you want to change the ammount hP.

Parameters:
damage - Neagtive number to reduce HP, positive number to increase HP. Custom increments, according to this variable.
manChange - Negative number to reduce manna, positive number to increase manna. Custom increments, according to this variable.
